prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a wild dog with bright yellow and blue fur.
Imagine a Pokemon that has sharp, spiky features and a sleek body, depicting both speed and agility.
Show me a powerful electric Pokemon with a striking color palette of blue and yellow, standing in a forest.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of lightning and speed, showcasing a dynamic and energetic personality.
Make an electric-type Pokemon that is both intimidating and friendly, with a unique fur pattern.
Generate a Pokemon that has a streamlined, quadruped body, reflecting its electric nature and agility.
Give me a detailed description of a Pokemon that thrives in urban settings, with vibrant blue and yellow colors.
